thread.title: An Essential Guide to Stock Market Lingo

author: WSJ Staff
title: An Essential Guide to Stock Market Lingo
text:
FAT FINGER DEFINITION: An accidental, large buy or sell order.
INTERESTING FACT: Given how interconnected different markets are nowadays, thanks to the rapid rise of computerized trading and other factors, many investors fear a domino effect when one mistake cascades into seemingly unrelated areas.
